title: Roaming data updated trigger
body: I'm using the Roaming Settings and Data to allow a user to have the same data across all of their devices. It would be great to have a Background Trigger when that data was changed on another device. This way I could update tiles, change reminders or notifications across all devices. Even if it was linked to a specific settings name like "HighPriority" or a custom name would give even more specific tasks when certain things change.
